name: SetWorldTime
notes: This function is only relevant for players that do not use a passing clock - see TogglePlayerClock.
tips: To set the minutes and/or to set the time for individual players, see SetPlayerTime.
description: Sets the world time (for all players) to a specific hour.
return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
pawn_code:
// Set the time to 12 o'clock (noon)
SetWorldTime(12);
related_fn:
SetPlayerTime: Set a player's time.
 SetWeather: Set the global weather.
 SetGravity: Set the global gravity.
